pages.title: Stalker
pages.text: Level: <level_t3>$(br2)While in the $(boss/t4/warden#otherside)Otherside$(), breaking an $(key)Ancient Vase$() has a chance to spawn a $(key)Stalker$().$(br2)$(key)Ancient Vases$() generate in $(copy:Ancient Temples)Ancient Temples$()[$(copy:deeperdarker:ancient_temple)deeperdarker:ancient_temple$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(boss/t4/warden#otherside)Otherside$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().
$(br)Defeating $(key)Stalker$() drops a $(key)Soul Crystal$(), which can be used to craft the $(mechanic/loot_charm)Magical Looting Charm$().
